targets.queryText:
SELECT
  to_unixtime(now()) - to_unixtime((SELECT MAX(to_timestamp_micros(time)) FROM voltage1)) AS "Voltage1 age (s)",
  to_unixtime(now()) - to_unixtime((SELECT MAX(to_timestamp_micros(time)) FROM voltage2)) AS "Voltage2 age (s)",
  to_unixtime(now()) - to_unixtime((SELECT MAX(to_timestamp_micros(time)) FROM temperature)) AS "Temperature age (s)"

SELECT
  ch7 AS "Current Sensor (Raw)"
FROM voltage2
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  LEAST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6,ch7) AS "Min (V)",
  GREATEST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6,ch7) AS "Max (V)",
  GREATEST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6,ch7) - LEAST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6,ch7) AS "ΔV (V)"
FROM voltage1
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  LEAST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6) AS "Min (V)",
  GREATEST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6) AS "Max (V)",
  GREATEST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6) - LEAST(ch0,ch1,ch2,ch3,ch4,ch5,ch6) AS "ΔV (V)"
FROM voltage2
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

WITH latest AS (SELECT * FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1),
vals AS (
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor0,0) AS v FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor1,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor2,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor3,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor4,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor5,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor6,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor7,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor8,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor9,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor10,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor11,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor12,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor13,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor14,0) FROM latest UNION ALL
  SELECT NULLIF(sensor15,0) FROM latest
)
SELECT
  MIN(v) AS "Min (°C)",
  MAX(v) AS "Max (°C)",
  AVG(v) AS "Avg (°C)"
FROM vals
WHERE v IS NOT NULL
SELECT ch0 AS "D1 ch0" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch1 AS "D1 ch1" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch2 AS "D1 ch2" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch3 AS "D1 ch3" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch4 AS "D1 ch4" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch5 AS "D1 ch5" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch6 AS "D1 ch6" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch7 AS "D1 ch7" FROM voltage1 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch0 AS "D2 ch0" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch1 AS "D2 ch1" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch2 AS "D2 ch2" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch3 AS "D2 ch3" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch4 AS "D2 ch4" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch5 AS "D2 ch5" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch6 AS "D2 ch6" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT ch7 AS "Current Raw" FROM voltage2 ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor0 AS "T sensor0" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor1 AS "T sensor1" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor2 AS "T sensor2" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor3 AS "T sensor3" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor4 AS "T sensor4" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor5 AS "T sensor5" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor6 AS "T sensor6" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor7 AS "T sensor7" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor8 AS "T sensor8" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor9 AS "T sensor9" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor10 AS "T sensor10" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor11 AS "T sensor11" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor12 AS "T sensor12" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor13 AS "T sensor13" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor14 AS "T sensor14" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sensor15 AS "T sensor15" FROM temperature ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1
